description:
Description :
        "It's you that I want. Size has nothing to do with it." He whispers sweet words as his muscular body envelopes her, relentlessly attacking her small bre**** that she's always been self-conscious about.Akari Hananoi is the manager of her company's judo team. One night after a drinking party with the team, she is taking care of one of the athletes, Iwashiro, who got too drunk. In his drunken slumber, he grabs her tight and won't let go, which leads to them spending the night together in each other's arms.With a massive 40cm height difference, they're two pieces that can't fit together, right? He'll show her mind and body how to slowly melt and loosen up in this exciting love story.Toshishita Medalist wa Ichizu na Kemono  Shinchousa 40-senchi, Watashitachi no Ai no Hagukumikata, , My Young Medalist Lover Is a Devoted Beast: Learning to Love Each Other Despite Our Size Difference, The Younger, Single-Minded Beast  How to Nurture Our Love, ,   /  40,  40,    mangabuddy is a website dedicated to fans of anime, , , , video games, and cosplay.
